title: Pirate ship Map
body:
I was thinking about pirate ships today, which brought me to the idea of pirate ships in league.
I came up with the idea of a 1v1 map in which you have 2 pirate ships, and a board slides out 2 min in but until then you shoot cannons filled with poro's at each other.... pretty cool idea imo

replies.body:
Reported for animal abuse.

You're going down OP.

YOHOHO!!

Meh, it's alright, I guess. 
xoxo

sounds good. you get like 2 mins to get items etc then...


THE BRIDGE IS OPENED, howling abyss with two twisted treelines connected to it :) awesome!

> sounds good. you get like 2 mins to get items etc then...
>

> THE BRIDGE IS OPENED, howling abyss with two twisted treelines connected to it :) awesome!

DONT LIKE THE IDEA
i can truly play dank plank at his final form {{champion:41}} {{champion:41}}
As long as his ship has a special animation when he ults.
Maybe during the 2 Mins you get to free farm as much gold as possible and once thats done, no healing, no buying and if you use abilities in this map, infinite mana.
ARAM good place for pirate ship
